content: chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet inv decrease followed by 1 half_double_crochet in the next 4 sts make 1 half_double_crochet inv decrease 6 sts *fasten_off and use white yarn to sew on a cross link to video - https //youtu be/1ts7gk3rnf0 if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
